Text: I would say if youre a conservative what the hell are you doing on TPB.  I think youre missing your demo.

You would be surprised. It's funny how positions are classified. Conservatives and Libertarians believe in personal freedom. Liberals believe things should always change toward someone else making decisions for them. Yet Liberals want the Federal Gov to impose laws on everyone, even if those people disagree. Conservatives say "We can make our own decisions in our own communities." Central vs Decentralized. That's the heart of it.

Geat book to with some interesting ideas
Thank you very much!!

Whoa, sp(latt)i-pie! If anything the recent conservative stance has been to have someone do the thinking for them, such as a Great Leader or a "W". It is true that liberals have wanted everyone to enjoy the rights that only a few at the top enjoy now, here in the US and abroad, but that is their delusion. The real heart of the matter is whether you want your life run by someone in a boardroom or by the community raising all up from the mud...
